name: XboxVSPS5
description: Very interesting prototype inspired by chess. This week's experimental game theme is match-3 games. On the basis of other people's code, the whole game is about Microsoft battles Sony. By eliminating the handle buttons of hostile forces, you can increase your market share. Reaching a certain level of share can trigger events, such as Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard, Sony's acquisition of bungie.
